.
When a Loyalty Clearance Is Required
A loyalty clearance is always required in the following cases:
when forfeiture of benefits for treason may be declared under the provisions of
38 U.S.C. 6104
, or
in connection with payments to persons formerly in enemy territory under
38 U.S.C. 5308
.
